ISSUE.TITLE: SeNames search is not working.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go /Admin/Common/SeNames 2) try to search 100-physical-gift-card 3) not able to search Expected it should be work as here https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com//Admin/Common/SeNames https://www.loom.com/share/700b19f383c145a59e5a8d2e56b5855b

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4434 Fixed problem with caching ACL records
